rooms.description: Open-plan living and dining area with integrated kitchen space. The layout emphasizes natural light and social interaction, designed following Vastu principles for auspiciousness and energy flow.
Open-plan integrated kitchen adjoining the living area. Equipped with modern appliances and ample storage space.
Dedicated home office space designed for productivity with sound insulation and ergonomic layout, ensuring minimal distraction from common areas.
Primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Vastu aligned for relaxation and energy balance; features a private balcony for natural ventilation.
Secondary bedroom designed with modern aesthetics. Includes built-in storage solutions and ample space for relaxation.
En-suite bathroom to the primary bedroom. Features water-efficient fixtures and a calming design consistent with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with the auspicious direction according to Vastu. Provides ample natural light and positive energy flow.
Large windows strategically placed to maximize ventilation and natural lighting throughout the living areas and bedrooms.
Balconies attached to bedrooms for improved air circulation and connection with nature.

auxiliary_features.description: Modern swimming pool integrated into the design. Positioned at a suitable distance from the main living area to ensure privacy and reduced noise.
